pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Ubuntu 旧版本的软件源、镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"该仓库包含了所有 Ubuntu 以前发布过的软件仓库、镜像 ISO，但不包含 Ubuntu 衍生版的 ISO。"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"软件源","children":"软件源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list","menus":[{"title":"Ubuntu 版本","items":[["22.10",{"release_name":"kinetic"}],["21.10",{"release_name":"impish"}],["21.04",{"release_name":"hirsute"}],["20.10",{"release_name":"groovy"}],["19.10",{"release_name":"eoan"}],["19.04",{"release_name":"disco"}],["18.10",{"release_name":"cosmic"}],["17.10",{"release_name":"artful"}],["17.04",{"release_name":"zesty"}],["16.10",{"release_name":"yakkety"}],["15.10",{"release_name":"wily"}],["15.04",{"release_name":"vivid"}],["14.10",{"release_name":"utopic"}],["13.10",{"release_name":"saucy"}],["13.04",{"release_name":"raring"}],["12.10",{"release_name":"quantal"}],["12.04 LTS",{"release_name":"precise"}],["11.10",{"release_name":"oneiric"}],["11.04",{"release_name":"natty"}],["10.10",{"release_name":"maverick"}],["10.04 LTS",{"release_name":"lucid"}],["9.10",{"release_name":"karmic"}],["9.04",{"release_name":"jaunty"}],["8.10",{"release_name":"intrepid"}],["8.04 LTS",{"release_name":"hardy"}],["7.10",{"release_name":"gutsy"}],["7.04",{"release_name":"feisty"}],["6.10",{"release_name":"edgy"}],["6.06 LTS",{"release_name":"dapper"}],["5.10",{"release_name":"breezy"}],["5.04",{"release_name":"hoary"}],["4.10",{"release_name":"warty"}]]},{"title":"启用 proposed","items":[["否",{"enable_proposed":"# "}],["是",{"enable_proposed":""}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"# 默认注释了源码镜像以提高 apt update 速度，如有需要可自行取消注释
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}} main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}} main restricted universe multiverse
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-updates main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-updates main restricted universe multiverse
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-backports main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-backports main restricted universe multiverse
deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-security main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-security main restricted universe multiverse

# 预发布软件源，不建议启用
{{enable_proposed}}deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-proposed main restricted universe multiverse
{{enable_proposed}}{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ubuntu/ {{release_name}}-proposed main restricted universe multiverse","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["更多版本代号可参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Releases","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Releases"}]]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"镜像","children":"镜像"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"请前往"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/releases/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"下载。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"非 AMD64(x86_64), Intel x86 架构的镜像请前往"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/releases/ports/releases/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"下载。"}]]}]

meta.title: Ubuntu 旧版本软件仓库镜像使用帮助
